metadata.title: NaniWear 11th Doctor 2.25 Inch Geek Button 11 Is My Doctor
features: Designed and manufactured in Denver, Colorado
description: You never forget your first Doctor, especially if he dances the Drunken Giraffe. For all those Matt Smith lovers, a button for those whom 11 was their first doctor. This button is a 2.25 inch (5.715 cm) pinback button that can be pinned anywhere, on a jacket, a book bag, messenger bag, or any clothes, and is perfect for convention gear. Buttons make great stocking stuffers, or party favors for your next geek get-together. Button has a gradated blue background with red, white and black lettering. Button is printed on professional laser printer, and assembled with a professional button making machine.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "2.25 x 0.25 x 2.25 inches; 0.64 Ounces", "Item model number": "11THDOCBUTT1", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "January 21, 2013"}
